Package ru.comgrid.server.api.user

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
ru.comgrid.server.api.user.UserService
@RestController @RequestMapping(value="/user", produces="application/json") public class UserService extends Object
User service, that has most commonly used user targeted endpoints.

  • Method Details

    • getUserInfo

      @GetMapping("/info") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getUserInfo(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.oauth2.core.user.OAuth2User user, @RequestParam(required=false,defaultValue="false") boolean includeChats)
      Get Person(frontend must not specify any credentials since it is done automatically if person is authorized).

      Add "includeChats=true" param if you want to include chats in returned Person object

      Parameters:
      user - Authenticated user from Spring security
      includeChats - boolean value whether to include Chat list or not
      Returns:
      Person in json format
